attributes.allegiance: House Arryn'''House Egen''' is a noble house from the Vale of Arryn, sworn to House Arryn, the Lord of the Eyrie
attributes.title: House Egen

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Ser Vardis Egen is also the sole known member of House Egen. Their sigil is a yellow sun, white crescent moon, and silver star on blue chief above white. Their words are "By Day or Night".
sections.Known members: * Ser {[[Vardis Egen]]}, [[Captain of the Guards]] at [[the Eyrie]]. Slain in trial by combat by the sellsword [[Bronn]] while championing for Lord [[Robin Arryn]].
